H1_split_answer1:
**Name:** Sustainable Urban Living: Practical Applications of Environmental Science

**Explanation:** This educational course/book aims to provide learners with a comprehensive understanding of environmental science and sustainability, specifically focusing on practical applications in urban settings. It will explore various sustainable practices, supported by case studies from cities around the world, to illustrate how these concepts can be effectively implemented in real-life scenarios.

**Table of Contents:**

| Chapter Number | Chapter Title                                      |
|----------------|----------------------------------------------------|
| 1              | Introduction to Environmental Science and Sustainability |
| 2              | The Importance of Sustainability in Urban Areas    |
| 3              | Key Principles of Sustainable Practices            |
| 4              | Case Study: Sustainable Urban Development in Copenhagen |
| 5              | Case Study: Green Infrastructure in New York City  |
| 6              | Case Study: Waste Management Innovations in Tokyo   |
| 7              | Community Engagement and Education for Sustainability |
| 8              | Policy Frameworks Supporting Urban Sustainability   |
| 9              | Future Trends in Urban Sustainability               |
| 10             | Conclusion and Call to Action                       |

**Page:** Display the available commands. 

Feel free to provide any additional details or preferences you may have for this course/book!
H1_split_answer2:
**Name:** Designing Ethical AI: A Comprehensive Course on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

**Explanation:** This course aims to provide learners with a deep understanding of artificial intelligence and machine learning, focusing on ethical considerations in AI development. Through real-world examples, particularly in healthcare and finance, participants will explore how to implement AI responsibly and effectively.

**Table of Contents:**

| Section | Chapter Title |
|---------|---------------|
| 1       | Introduction to Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning |
| 2       | The Importance of Ethics in AI Development |
| 3       | Real-World Applications of AI in Healthcare |
| 4       | Real-World Applications of AI in Finance |
| 5       | Ethical Frameworks and Guidelines for AI |
| 6       | Case Studies: Successes and Failures in Ethical AI |
| 7       | Future Trends in AI and Ethical Considerations |
| 8       | Conclusion and Call to Action for Responsible AI Development |

**Page:** Display the available commands.
